Text.Page:
We need to keep the argons at bay if we're to finish our mission here.

Take out {@LinkCreature:45#1001#kelba chargers}, {@LinkCreature:45#1002#argonomorph dwarf orcans}, and {@LinkCreature:45#1003#argonomorph runekeepers} near the Tower Approach.

Report to {@Creature:245#1002$$Orheno} at Field Base Tenacity when your mission is complete.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
